blog_site_key2: Iss project mei hum `Medium` jaisi ek blog website ka basic version banana sikhenge.
blog_site_key4:
Iss project ki suruvat karne se pehele aap ko blog website ko visit karke samjho ki vo kaise kaam karti hain.
ye kuch examples hain....
blog_site_key6: Aur kuch app bhi dhondoo hum kitni help kare..
blog_site_key7: Iss project ko shuru karne se phele ye cheeze dhyan deni jaruri hain.
blog_site_key8: Ye project hum JavaScript ka use karke banayenge issleye humne enough JavaScript aani jaruri hain.
blog_site_key9: Iss project main hum da`tab`ase ka aache tarike se use karna bhi sikhenge.
blog_site_key10: Aur front-end ke leye Html, Css, Bootstrap jaisi languages ka isstemal karnge.
blog_site_key11: Aur Da`tab`ase ke leye hum MySql use karnege.
blog_site_key14:
Phele apne project ke da`tab`ase structure ke bare main group main disscuss karein.
aur apne da`tab`ase ko banane ke leye ek script lekhe.
Iss da`tab`ase ka hum apne projet main use karnge.

Kuch jaruri endpoints aapko apne group members ke sath disscuss karke banane hain.

aur login logout main aapko kuch authentication lagana hain
blog_site_key23:
ka use karke.
jaise ke user tabhi lgin kar sakta hain jab uske pass valid access token hoga.
